reviewText:
These 2 DVD's are from 2009 and were sold separately.  As a combination, they are
inexpensive and useful as an introduction to Xingyi Quan.  In the voice-over, Ken
Gullette includes the principles that he has promoted in his other DVD's and e-books:
maintain ground path, a mind-set of peng, rotation of dan-tien, and silk-reeling
throughout.  He also emphasizes what not to do in each movement.
